DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of bee venom acupuncture on pain intensity, functional status and quality of life of patients with chronic low back pain.
DOC.brief_title: Bee Venom Acupuncture for the Treatment of Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: nonspecific, chronic low back pain over 3 months Must have LBP of more than VAS 4 cancer, vertebral fracture, spinal infection, inflammatory spondylitis spinal operation radicular pain other musculoskeletal pain physicological or mental disorders allergic history to BV therapy or insect bite
